thoughts.text: I need to start by setting up the Django project and creating the necessary apps.
thoughts.reasoning: Django is the backend framework for the blog website, and setting up the project is the first step in the development process.
thoughts.plan:
- Set up Django project
- Create necessary apps
- Implement user login
- Create profile page
- Design posts page
- Incorporate comment section
thoughts.criticism: I haven't made any progress yet, so I need to start working on the project immediately.
thoughts.speak: I will begin by setting up the Django project and creating the necessary apps.

args.code:
import os
import django

os.environ.setdefault('DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE', 'blog_project.settings')
django.setup()

from django.core.management import call_command

call_command('startproject', 'blog_project')
call_command('startapp', 'users')
call_command('startapp', 'posts')
call_command('startapp', 'comments')
args.name: setup_django_project
